name: 20 Triderium: Support Developers
description: 20 Triderium: If you enjoy the game, consider this a thank you tip to the developers for spending over ten thousand hours on this game for your enjoyment. You may not need the power boost, but it does helps support the development of the game so more content, missions, aliens, anomalies, places, items and systems are added.  You're literally making the game you play better because we're not funded in any way like the big corporate guys who exploit you.  We didn't even get crowd sourced.  Thanks for keeping the lights on.

name: LIMITED TIME ONLY: Founders Role Play Favor Medallion
description: When we choose people to Omnipotent Roleplay Sessions, these precious first edition founders medallions will help your chances of being selected like a Golden Ticket. Roleplay sessions will be forever remembered in game.  One we get super entertaining role play sessions: We are to contract anime studios & make a quality anime movie series immortalizing the characters... possibly yours! These could become the most coveted founder item in the history of gaming.  We'll allow you to trade em.

name: Astronomically Busty Beach Babe Anime Aliens
description:
January 20, 2025, we celebrate the death of DEI by lampooning the opposite of the pushers!

#1 Moral: 100% of revenue from this DLC goes to rescuing women out of the sex trade, human trafficking or mothers raising children.

#2 Moral: AI-generated beyond-belief busty alien art saves lives of women. Money is going here instead of websites or movies where women ruin their lives and lose their love and faith.

#3 Respecting Boundaries: There's nothing in this package you wouldn't see on the beach on Io, Mars, or Earth today.
Still, I must label this 18+ and mature though the title mature and adult is always ironic for stuff that's completely and udderly immature.
Fully clothed, exaggeratedly busty females of various alien species will replace the tame basic icons.

#4 Reflective Philosophy: Why is it that society is accepting of every body type on television— all races, fat, thin, short, tall, strong, weak, able-bodied or not— but the thin busty lady is banned from being on TV? Starfighter General is here to challenge society's hypocrisy. We cancel the cancel culture.

#5 Theme: Buying a copy of this package enhances the game's theme of 80's future wild west outlandishness.

Some people want to roleplay an interstellar player often with machismo out of irony and parody. This BBA module allows this.

Bonus: You can buy more than one Beach Babe Alien Module.

The more Beach Babe Alien Modules you buy ===
         === The higher probability of the more outlandish the alien babes.

Enjoy Starfighter General, the most ambitious video game ever conceived. Purchasing virtual goods helps make the game faster for all! YAY!

In Space, no one hears you complain about back pain as much.

So it saves lives of women by taking money from bad guys and rescuing women. What's not to love?

It's like being a hero who rescues a princess from a bad guy in real life, except you're rescuing a woman who doesn't even know she's a princess, but has low self-esteem.  For once it's morally acceptable since no women are exploited and your purchase will help them escape the trap of self destruction.  Thank you.

name: One-Month Subscription
description: Gain access to premium features and content for one month. This subscription supports the developers and enhances your experience in-game.

name: Three-Month Subscription
description: Gain access to premium features and content for three months. Unlock unlimited MMORPG mode past Hunter's Protection, gain bonus triderium daily, 25% xmatter bonus raiding, +1 Scrap gained per won raid.

name: Twelve-Month Subscription
description: Gain access to premium features and content for twelve months. Unlock unlimited MMORPG mode past Hunter's Protection, gain bonus triderium daily, 25% xmatter bonus raiding, +1 Scrap gained per won raid.
